bio: Komashura fired up! He’s ready for the celebrations, but he’s mistaken it for a martial arts tournament…

soultimate.name: Shura Shower
soultimate.description: Burn foes for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Drop foe's Attack by 1.0% every hit, lasts 5 sec.
skill.name: Burned Spirits

name: Reunion Komashura
